body_html: With 0.4.5 and the --action_env change, there should be no issue about --batch or restarting the server (unless the change got reverted again). --action_env is basically fixing those environment variable in the rc file instead of relying on the environment to stick.
body_text: With 0.4.5 and the --action_env change, there should be no issue about --batch or restarting the server (unless the change got reverted again). --action_env is basically fixing those environment variable in the rc file instead of relying on the environment to stick.
body: With 0.4.5 and the --action_env change, there should be no issue about --batch or restarting the server (unless the change got reverted again). --action_env is basically fixing those environment variable in the rc file instead of relying on the environment to stick.
